Module CAViewer
Package sample.model

Class APGTable

java.lang.Object
sample.model.APGTable
public class APGTable
extends java.lang.Object
Used to construct an APGTable (ruletable for apgsearch)

Example Usage: 
 APGTable apgTable = new APGTable(2, "permute", NeighbourhoodGenerator.generateMoore(1));
 apgTable.addUnboundedVariable("death");
 apgTable.addOuterTotalisticTransition(0, 1, 3, 0, 1);
 apgTable.addOuterTotalisticTransition(1, 1, 2, 0, 1);
 apgTable.addOuterTotalisticTransition(1, 1, 3, 0, 1);
 System.out.println(apgTable.compileAPGTable());

  • Constructor Details

    • APGTable

      public APGTable​(int numStates, java.lang.String symmetry, Coordinate[] neighbourhood)
      Initialises the APGTable
      Parameters:
      numStates - The number of states of the APGTable
      symmetry - The symmetry of the APGTable
      neighbourhood - The neighbourhood of the APGTable

  • Method Details

    • addTransition

      public void addTransition​(int inputState, int outputState, java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> transition)
      Adds a new transition to the APGTable
      Parameters:
      inputState - The initial state of the cell
      outputState - The final state of the cell
      transition - The transition of to be inserted

    • addOuterTotalisticTransition

      public void addOuterTotalisticTransition​(int inputState, int outputState, int num, java.lang.String variable0, java.lang.String variable1)
      Adds an outer-totalistic transition.
      Parameters:
      inputState - The initial state of the cell
      outputState - The final state of the cell
      num - The outer totalistic number
      variable0 - There will be Smax - num of this variable in the final transition
      variable1 - There will be num of this variable in the final transition

    • addUnboundedVariable

      public void addUnboundedVariable​(java.lang.String variableName, int[] value)
      Adds an unbounded variable. See https://github.com/GollyGang/ruletablerepository/wiki/UnboundVariables.
      Parameters:
      variableName - Name of the variable
      value - Value of the variable. For example, {0, 1}.
